column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We ran into an issue with the cookie pizza we ordered after dinner
column2: and we had to wait over 30 minutes
column3: but they finally brought it out to us
column5: and apologized profusely.  It was such a minor mistake
column6: that things like this happen.  The staff was super friendly here
column7: and I would visit this particular location in the future again!  If you haven't had Lou Malnati's pizza...you have to try them.  Its amazing.
